alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 1:54PM EST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...High water caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 12.6 feet Sunday morning. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 PM EST.
